  • Packages that use org.apache.commons.math4.random 
    Package Description
    org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.interpolation
    Univariate real functions interpolation algorithms.
    org.apache.commons.math4.optim
    Generally, optimizers are algorithms that will either minimize or maximize a scalar function, called the objective function.
    org.apache.commons.math4.optim.nonlinear.scalar
    Algorithms for optimizing a scalar function.
    org.apache.commons.math4.random
    Random Data Generation
  • Classes in org.apache.commons.math4.random used by org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.interpolation

    Generate random vectors isotropically located on the surface of a sphere.
